venue: Sensory Studio at Lincoln Park, 123 Craft Ave, Chicago, IL
steps: Start with a welcome circle to introduce everyone.
Show examples of finished sensory crafts.
Guide children to choose their crafting materials.
Assist children in creating their sensory crafts, encouraging them to choose textures they like.
Display and admire each child's finished craft.
End with a goodbye circle to share experiences.
safety: Ensure all materials are non-toxic and appropriate for age.
